## Description {#details}

A pass to do RPO deduction and propagation of function attributes.

This pass provides a general RPO or &quot;top down&quot; propagation of function attributes. For a few (rare) cases, we can deduce significantly more about function attributes by working in RPO, so this pass provides the complement to the post-order pass above where the majority of deduction is performed.

Definition at line 72 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-h">FunctionAttrs.h</a>.
